Apos.​Gui.​GuiHelper
public static
Apos.​Gui.​GuiHelper

Unorganized helper functions for Apos.Gui.

Public Variables
Scale
public static float Scale { get; set }

The scale of the UI. Defaults to 1f.

Font
public static DynamicSpriteFont Font { get; set }

The font used by components that display text.

FontSize
public static float FontSize { get; set }

Size for the font. Defaults to 30.

Window
public static GameWindow Window { get; set }

Your game's window. Used by responsive components.

WindowWidth
public static int WindowWidth { get }
Returns

The window's width in UI scale.

WindowHeight
public static int WindowHeight { get }
Returns

The window's height in UI scale.

GuiSampler
public static SamplerState GuiSampler { get; set }

Defaults to LinearClamp.

NextLoopActions
public static List<Action> NextLoopActions { get; set }

This is a list of actions that will be executed at the start of a game loop. This is useful for queueing actions that will be done in the next loop cycle.  This is required when doing something that will mess up layouts before the draw function.

UIMatrix
public static Matrix UIMatrix { get }
Returns

A matrix representing UI coordinate system.

ScrollWheelDelta
public static int ScrollWheelDelta { get }
Returns

The scroll wheel delta since the last update.

Public Functions

public static Point MouseToUI()
Returns

The mouse in the UI coordinate system.

public static Point ScreenToUI(
Point p
)
Parameter
p
Point

A point in the screen coordinate system.

Returns

The point converted into it's equivalent UI coordinate.

public static int ScreenToUI(
int n
)
Parameter
n
int

A number on the screen's X or Y axis.

The number converted into it's equivalent UI coordinate on the X or Y axis.

Begin
public static void Begin(
SpriteBatch s
)

Calls begin on the spritebatch with the UI rasterizer state, transform matrix and sampler state.

Parameter
s
SpriteBatch

A spritebatch that is waiting for begin to be called on it.

End
public static void End(
SpriteBatch s
)

Calls end on the spritebatch.

Parameter
s
SpriteBatch

A spritebatch that is waiting for end to be called on it.

SetScissor
public static void SetScissor(
SpriteBatch s,
Rectangle r
)

Uses a rectangle to limit the area that the spritebatch is allowed to draw to.  The rectangle is converted into screen coordinates.

Parameters
s
SpriteBatch

A spritebatch that is being tracked by the UI.

r
Rectangle

The rectangle to use for the spritebatch scissor in UI coordinates.

ResetScissor
public static void ResetScissor(
SpriteBatch s,
Rectangle r
)

Uses a rectangle to limit the area that the spritebatch is allowed to draw to.

Parameters
s
SpriteBatch

A spritebatch that is being tracked by the UI.

r
Rectangle

The rectangle to use for the spritebatch scissor in screen coordinates.

UpdateSetup
public static void UpdateSetup()

This should be called at the start of the game's update loop.

DrawGui
public static void DrawGui(
SpriteBatch s,
Component c
)

This should be used on a UI root component.  This function tracks the spritebatch to call being and end correctly.

Parameters
s
SpriteBatch

A spritebatch that is waiting for begin to be called on it.

c
Component

A root component to draw.

DrawString
public static void DrawString(
SpriteBatch s,
string t,
Vector2 p,
Color c
)

Draws a string using the Font, FontSize and UI scale.

Parameters
s
SpriteBatch

A spritebatch that is being tracked by the UI.

t
string

The string to draw.

p
Vector2

The position for the string.

c
Color

The color for the string.

public static Vector2 MeasureString(
string t
)
Parameter
t
string

The string to measure.

Private Variables
_scale
private static float _scale

The scale field behind the Scale property.

_rasterState
private static RasterizerState _rasterState

A rasterizer state that enables the scissor test for the spritebatch.

_beginCalled
private static bool _beginCalled

Tracks whether begin has been called on the spritebatch.
